20101209013235.444|20101209013236.556|CCO|ATTACKS?

20101209013237.667|20101209013238.778|CCO|>> Reporter: FLOODS AND
20101209013238.778|20101209013239.889|CCO|HURRICANES AREN'T THE ONLY
20101209013239.889|20101209013241.000|CCO|DISASTERS BUSINESSES NEED TO
20101209013241.000|20101209013242.667|CCO|CONSIDER.
20101209013242.667|20101209013244.333|CCO|THERE ARE ALSO POTENTIAL MAN-
20101209013244.333|20101209013246.000|CCO|MADE CALAMITIES, LIKE CYBER
20101209013246.000|20101209013247.667|CCO|ATTACKS.
20101209013247.667|20101209013249.333|CCO|PEOPLE WHO TRIED TO CONNECT TO
20101209013249.333|20101209013251.000|CCO|MASTERCARD'S CORPORATE WEBSITE
20101209013251.000|20101209013252.667|CCO|COULDN'T FOR MUCH OF TODAY.
20101209013252.667|20101209013254.333|CCO|VISA'S CORPORATE SITE WAS ALSO
20101209013254.333|20101209013256.000|CCO|TARGETED THIS AFTERNOON.
20101209013256.000|20101209013257.667|CCO|NO CREDIT CARD SALES WERE
20101209013257.667|20101209013259.333|CCO|AFFECTED, BUT INTERNET SECURITY
20101209013259.333|20101209013301.000|CCO|EXPERT RAJ GOEL SAYS THERE'S AN
20101209013301.000|20101209013302.667|CCO|IMPORTANT LESSON HERE.
20101209013302.667|20101209013304.333|CCO|>> NO FIRM IS TOO BIG, OR TOO
20101209013304.333|20101209013306.000|CCO|SMALL, TO BE VICTIMIZED.
20101209013306.000|20101209013307.667|CCO|>> YOU MAY NOT BE A DIRECT
20101209013307.667|20101209013309.333|CCO|TARGET OF AN ATTACK, BUT YOU CAN
20101209013309.333|20101209013311.000|CCO|BE THE INNOCENT DRIVE-BY VICTIM
20101209013311.000|20101209013312.667|CCO|OF A LARGE ATTACK BY SOMEONE
20101209013312.667|20101209013314.333|CCO|ELSE, BECAUSE YOU SHARE THE SAME
20101209013314.333|20101209013316.000|CCO|HOSTING COMPANY OR INTERNET
20101209013316.000|20101209013317.667|CCO|SERVICE PROVIDER OR I.P. ADDRESS
20101209013317.667|20101209013319.333|CCO|SPACE WITH THEM.
20101209013319.333|20101209013321.000|CCO|>> Reporter: SO, ANOTHER LESSON
20101209013321.000|20101209013322.667|CCO|FOR FIRMS IS TO TRY TO MINIMIZE
20101209013322.667|20101209013324.333|CCO|POTENTIAL DAMAGE THROUGH
20101209013324.333|20101209013326.000|CCO|REDUNDANCY.
20101209013326.000|20101209013327.667|CCO|THAT CAN MEAN MULTIPLE SERVERS
20101209013327.667|20101209013329.333|CCO|IN MULTIPLE LOCATIONS USING
20101209013329.333|20101209013331.000|CCO|MULTIPLE NETWORKS.
20101209013331.000|20101209013332.667|CCO|SECURITY EXPERT JOHN OTTMAN HAS
20101209013332.667|20101209013334.333|CCO|LESSON NUMBER THREE: KEEP THINGS
20101209013334.333|20101209013336.000|CCO|AS CONFIDENTIAL AS YOU CAN.
20101209013336.000|20101209013337.667|CCO|>> PEOPLE SHOULD ONLY HAVE
20101209013337.667|20101209013339.333|CCO|ENOUGH ACCESS TO SENSITIVE DATA
20101209013339.333|20101209013341.000|CCO|AS WHAT THEY NEED IN ORDER TO
20101209013341.000|20101209013342.667|CCO|PERFORM THEIR JOB.
20101209013342.667|20101209013344.333|CCO|AND THAT MEANS THAT ENTITLEMENTS
20101209013344.333|20101209013346.000|CCO|AND PRIVILEGES TO DATA HAVE TO
20101209013346.000|20101209013347.667|CCO|BE CAREFULLY CONTROLLED.
20101209013347.667|20101209013349.333|CCO|EXPERTS SAY LESSON NUMBER FOUR
20101209013349.333|20101209013351.000|CCO|IS NOT TO SCRIMP ON REGULAR
20101209013351.000|20101209013353.000|CCO|SECURITY REVIEWS, A TEMPTATION
20101209013353.000|20101209013355.000|CCO|DURING TOUGH ECONOMIC TIMES.
20101209013355.000|20101209013357.000|CCO|>> GOOD SECURITY AND GOOD I.T.
20101209013357.000|20101209013359.000|CCO|SYSTEMS ARE A BUSINESS ENABLER.
20101209013359.000|20101209013401.000|CCO|FOR MOST OF OUR CLIENTS, IF YOU
20101209013401.000|20101209013402.667|CCO|HAVE A GOOD RUNNING I.T.
20101209013402.667|20101209013404.333|CCO|ENVIRONMENT-- WHETHER IT'S YOUR
20101209013404.333|20101209013406.000|CCO|EMAIL IS FLOWING-- THERE'S NO
20101209013406.000|20101209013407.667|CCO|SPAM.
20101209013407.667|20101209013409.333|CCO|THERE ARE NO VIRUSES.
20101209013409.333|20101209013411.000|CCO|COMPUTERS DON'T CRASH.
20101209013411.000|20101209013412.111|CCO|YOUR WEBSITE DOESN'T GO DOWN.

20101209013413.222|20101209013414.333|CCO|>> Reporter: TODAY'S ATTACK DID
20101209013414.333|20101209013415.444|CCO|NOT APPEAR TO COMPROMISE ANY
20101209013415.444|20101209013416.556|CCO|PERSONAL DATA FROM BUSINESSES OR
20101209013416.556|20101209013417.667|CCO|CONSUMERS.

20101209013418.778|20101209013419.889|CCO|WEBSITE WIKILEAKS COORDINATED

20101209013441.000|20101209013443.000|CCO|>> Reporter: TODAY'S ATTACKS
20101209013443.000|20101209013445.000|CCO|CAME FROM HACKERS ON THE
20101209013445.000|20101209013447.000|CCO|OUTSIDE.
